data.name: Acid Bomb
data.description: You toss a grenade which splatters a corrosive acid everywhere. Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them take a Y ability penalty to corporeal resistance and suffer X corporeal damage over 21 seconds.

data.name: Addling Shot
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Gain a 660 unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Armored Plating
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet takes only 80% damage for 20 seconds.

data.name: Artillery Barrage
data.description: You select a spot on the ground and call in an artillery strike for up to 4 seconds, dealing 600 damage per second to up to 30 enemies within 30 feet of that spot.

data.name: Autoloader
data.description: Generates 5 stacks of Improvised Upgrades.

data.name: Bandolier
data.description: Each time a Path of Grenadier ability deals damage, you will gain 1 action point and 1 point of morale.

data.name: Barbed Wire
data.description: You fling coils of barbed wire all around you, rooting all enemies within 30 feet in place for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Blunderbuss Blast
data.description: You fire a blast of short-range pellets which deal X physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Bombardment Turret
data.description: You construct a mid-range grenade turret. You generate Improvised Upgrades if you are within 40 feet. You will lose IU starting at 81ft or if another turret is contructed. Cooldown begins when the turret is summoned or destroyed.

data.name: Bugman's Best
data.description: You carefully unpack a mini-keg of rare and precious Bugman's Finest Stout with reverential awe. For the next 15 seconds, the faint vapors escaping from the keg will rejuvenate any group members within 65 feet of it, restoring X health every 3 seconds. You dream of the day that the brew will be aged enough to actually tap and drink.

data.name: Burn Salve
data.description: You distribute burn salve to groupmember's within 100 feet, they gain a X ability bonus to elemental resistance for 60 minutes.

data.name: Cannon Smash
data.note: Requires 15 points in Path of The Rifleman
data.description: A massive cannonball smashes into your target, dealing 1200 damage and causing them to take a (Rank * 30) morale penalty to armor for 30 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 action points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to dodge all ranged attacks and disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Concussion Grenade
data.description: You lob a grenade that releases a powerful shockwave on impact, dealing X corporeal damage to your target and all enemies within 20 feet.

data.name: Concussive Mine
data.description: When your Land Mine detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for 10 seconds, increasing the build times of their abilities by 50%.

data.name: Coordinated Fire
data.description: Signal Flare has its duration, cooldown, and tick interval reduced by 50%. It will also cause the victim to suffer 15% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Crack Shot
data.description: A well-aimed shot which deals X physical damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Electromagnet
data.description:
You set up a device which unleashes a powerful wave of force, pulling up to six enemy players within 75 feet inwards towards it and knocking down monsters. 1 second later, the device blasts outwards and snares all enemies within 30 feet, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 4 seconds.
The attack uses the ranged statistic.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Extra Ammo
data.description: When you construct a turret, it will restore 20 action points to everyone within 30 feet every 2 seconds.

data.name: Extra Powder
data.description: Path of Grenadier abilities except Napalm Grenade gain a 50% increase to the size of their areas of effect.

data.name: Fightin' Chance
data.description: Gain a 120 unique bonus to ballistic skill, weapon skill, and strength. Take a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Firebomb
data.description: You toss a grenade filled with flaming pitch which deals X corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Flak Jacket
data.description: You don an experimental suit of protective gear, gain a X ability bonus to armor for up to 1 hours.

data.name: Flame Turret
data.description: You construct a short-range, flamethrower turret. You generate Improvised Upgrades if you are within 30 feet. You will lose IU starting at 31ft or if another turret is contructed. Cooldown begins when the turret is summoned or destroyed.

data.name: Flashbang Grenade
data.description: You toss a grenade which explodes with a burst of force, dealing X corporeal damage to the target. The blinding flash interrupts the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Explosives
data.description: Your turret explodes flinging explosives to up to 18 enemies within 65 of it. Enemies will be afflicted with Acid Bomb, Fulminate Grenade, Flashbang Grenade, Friction Burn, and Incendiary Rounds.

data.name: Focused Fire
data.description: You focus all of your shots on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, dealing X physical damage to them every second. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fulmination Grenade
data.description: You lob a grenade which shatters when it hits your enemy, dealing X corporeal damage over 15 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Friction Burn
data.description:
A powerful swipe with your spanner which smacks all enemies in front of you up to 40 feet away, dealing X corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
The attack uses the ranged statistic.

data.name: Gun Blast
data.description: A gun attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Gun Turret
data.description: You construct a long-range, machine-gun turret. You generate Improvised Upgrades if you are within 30 feet. You will lose IU starting at 31ft or if another turret is contructed. Cooldown begins when the turret is summoned or destroyed.

data.name: Hand-Crafted Scope
data.description: Increases your autoattack speed by 50% when using a gun.

data.name: Hip Shot
data.description: A quick shot from the hip which deals X physical damage. This attack may be used at close range.

data.name: Hollow-Points
data.description: Snipe and Gun Blast will now deal an additional X physical damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Incendiary Rounds
data.description: You fire bullets that burst into flame when they strike the enemy, dealing X corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Land Mine
data.description: You fling out a land mine which arms itself immediately and persists for up to 1 minute. The mine will detonate when an enemy gets too close, dealing X physical damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggering them for up to 5 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Lightning Rod
data.description: You deploy a shock rod at your feet which will remain for up to 9 seconds and periodically blast out with waves of power, dealing X corporeal damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet of it.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to ballistic skill.

data.name: Napalm Grenade
data.description:
You toss a grenade packed full of dangerous napalm gel on to the ground, where it will burst open in a 20 feet radius and burn for 30 seconds. Every 1.5 seconds, enemies within the area gain a stack of Napalm. Napalm deals X corporeal damage every second for 10 seconds and stacks 10 times.
If there are multiple Napalm Grenades in the same area only the highest level one will deal damage.

data.name: Phosphorous Shells
data.description: You blast your enemy with powerful and unstable phosphorous ammo, dealing X corporeal damage to them. The victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them will also suffer Y corporeal damage over 10 seconds as the shells burst into flame.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to dodge and parry will be reduced by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Proximity Alarm
data.description: Increases the chance for you and your groupmates to detect hidden enemies by 50% while you or your group are within 20 feet feet of your turret.

data.name: Redeploy
data.description: You activate your turret's automatic redeployment mechanism, instantly moving it to your current location.

data.name: Reinforced Casing
data.description: Adds 160 wounds to your turrets.

data.name: Scattershot
data.description: You release a string of several gun blasts in a row dealing 1200 damage to enemies 45 feet in front of you and reducing their movement speed by 60% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: You activate the self-destruct mechanism built into your turret, destroying the turret and dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet of it, knocking them down for 4 seconds.

data.name: Shock Grenade
data.description: You toss a grenade at an ally which removes stagger effects from them and five others within 25 feet.

data.name: Signal Flare
data.description: You mark the enemy with a bright signal flare, dealing X physical damage over 21 seconds and reducing their chances to dodge or block attacks by 5%.

data.name: Snipe
data.description: A slow but powerful gun shot which deals X physical damage to your enemy and can not be defended against.

data.name: Spanner Swipe
data.description:
You clobber your enemy with your spanner, dealing X physical damage and reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Static Discharge
data.description: You quickly trigger one of your many gadgets and release a sudden shockwave, dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Sticky Bomb
data.description: A packet of explosives which sticks to your target and slowly burns, dealing X corporeal damage over 15 seconds. If the effect runs for its full course or the target is killed, then a concealed inner package of explosives will suddenly detonate, dealing Y corporeal damage to the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Stopping Power
data.description: Whenever Hip Shot targets an enemy within 40 feet, it becomes undefendable and removes movement effects from the enemy. (Charge, Mutating Release, Shrug it Off, Yer Goin' Down, Fleet-Footed, etc)

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from stuns and knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Strafing Run
data.description: You call for air support, signaling for a strafing run which deals X physical damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away. Any enemy players hit by the powerful shells will be sent flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to corporeal resistance.

data.name: Tangling Wire
data.description: After ending or being removed, Barbed Wire will now snare targets by 40% and deal X physical damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Throwing Arm
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of the Grenadier abilities by 25%.

data.name: Tracer Rounds
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% as long as you have an active turret.

data.name: Trench Fighting
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Well-Oiled Machine
data.description: You can now construct your turrets instantly and their action point cost is reduced to 20.

data.name: Improvised Upgrades
data.description:
You generate 1 stack of Improvised Upgrades every 2 seconds, maximum of 5 stacks. Improvised Upgrades grants you +4% outgoing damage pus additional benefits based on active turret per stack.
Gun Turret: +5% range for you and your turret.
Bombardment Turret: Reduces the duration and tick interval of Path of Grenadier/Tinkerer DoTs by 7%. +5% turret range.
Flame Turret: +2 to AoE target limit, +6% AoE radius, +4% dodge/disrupt for you and turret, -5% range.

data.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
data.description: You load your rifle with the finest of rounds. For the next 15 seconds, all path of the rifleman abilities and your ranged auto attacks will deal X additional physical damage that bypasses all armor.
